gui.requirements.fruit_of_the_gods: Requires the user to have eaten atleast 1 FRUIT OF THE GODS!

gui.ability.force_field.name: Force Field
gui.ability.force_field.description: While out of combat, regenerate shield points up to
gui.ability.presence_of_a_god.name: Presence of a God
gui.ability.presence_of_a_god.descriptio: Every 5 seconds life will grow in a radius of 5 blocks. Number of plants affected:
gui.ability.sword_slash.name: Sword Slash
gui.ability.sword_slash.description: Empowers the users sword with unending burning flames. Upon swinging the sword the flames will fly towards the target creating an fire explosion on hit and damaging all nearby targets.
gui.ability.shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
gui.ability.shield_bash.description: Turns any shield into a deadly weapon. Upon blocking, all targets in front of the shield will be knocked back. Blocks with weak resistance will colaps when hit by the shockwave.
gui.ability.berseker.name: Berserker
gui.ability.berseker.description: Empowers the user, giving strength and speed. Jumping over mountains is an easy fit. Even blocks and enemies can't resist your punches. If the target enemy doesn't have an helmet to protect his skull, a critical hit will be their undoing.
gui.ability.chain.name: Chain
gui.ability.chain.description: Gives the user mobility by hooking blocks to thrust themselves towards the blocks. Or hook an enemy to pull them towards them.
gui.ability.gravity_bomb.name: Gravity Bomb
gui.ability.gravity_bomb.description: Throw a powerful bomb that on impact pulls all entities, including the caster, into the center of the gravitational field increasing the damage taken. Boss Entities do not take increase damage.
gui.ability.revitalise.name: Revitalise
gui.ability.revitalise.description: Heals the user overtime. While the health of the user is below the maximum, Revitalise will replenish what is missing as long as the user has rage points.
gui.ability.reaper_of_souls.name: Reaper of Souls
gui.ability.reaper_of_souls.description: Gives a chance to add a soul to your balance when killing an entity. Current chance:
